column5: I have a brand new 4 bedroom house in a new sub division with friendly neighbors, double size game room with sports bar set up includes 5 tvs, professional pool table and poker set up. Garage is converted into a full martial arts gym with mats mirrors and training equipment. It has a large kitchen with granite counter-tops and covered back patio with large BBQ pit. It has wifi and washer dryer. It can comfortably fit 10 guests and would be great for a superbowl getaway.
